duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead and supervise all aspects of the Family Member experience in the restaurant, from talent management to recruitment to training and promotion of current Family Members.
Inspire Family Members to deliver and succeed, and create action plans based on performance data and financial goals.
Facilitate discussions among Family Members and Managers to ensure expectations are clear, share best practices, address underperforming areas, and resolve open questions.
Train and coach Team Leaders and Managers, empowering them to lead their shift and focus on developing their Family Members.
Recognize when customer preferences are changing and adjust service delivery to meet customer demands.

Develop the budget, expense plans, and sales goals as part of financial planning in order to achieve financial targets; manage profit and loss, oversee financial tasks such as cash reporting, labor, food expenses, repairs and maintenance.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma/GED or equivalent work experience
